Body:
The English Wiktionary is a pretty decent source for this kind of thing, at least to get you started.

There are all kinds of etymology categories of which these are relevant to your question:

  • Turkish terms derived from Armenian
  • Ottoman Turkish terms derived from Armenian
  • Armenian terms derived from Turkish
  • Armenian terms derived from Ottoman Turkish
  • Armenian terms derived from Turkic languages

(Bonus: Spanish terms derived from Dutch ... Dutch terms derived from Spanish)

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
